text: The Secretary of State for Scotland is the main minister responsible for Scotland in the Government of the United Kingdom. They sit in Cabinet and run the Scotland Office. The current Secretary of State for Scotland is Ian Murray, who was appointed by Prime Minister, Keir Starmer when he came to power on 5 July 2024. ==References== Category:Members of the Cabinet of the United Kingdom Category:Politics of Scotland Category:1707 establishments *
title: Secretary of State for Scotland
